title: Handheld Console Concept - Rust Hackweek
description:
This was for one my previous hackweeks. I really loved the idea of being able to pick these consoles off of dead scientists that you come across in Rust and to be able to find and collect more games across the map.
Concept and design process by me in a week. Wish i had more time for this!
Pixel art originally done by https://twitter.com/ArkhaiPxls

Triangles.info: I never took stock but it's probably a lot

Materials.info: This is including existing in-game materials in a 4-way blender shader

Texture Size.info: various texture sizes but most were 1024

Collaborators.info: I re-used various in-game materials that were made by both Damian Larzarski & Vincent Mayeur
